definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)

pinyin: chuan2 shu1 kong4 zhi4 xie2 ding4

sentences.english: Optic fiber is now the preferred transmission medium for long-haul trunks.
sentences.chinese: 光纖已是長途幹線的首選傳輸媒質。

sentences.english: When the Q-Switch is off (closed), there is no power whatsoever being transmitted from the laser.
sentences.chinese: 當Q開關關斷時，激光器中就沒有功率傳輸。

sentences.english: If the device finds the system holding the 'clock' line inactive, the transmission is terminated.
sentences.chinese: 如果設備發現主機系統將電平拉低，就終止傳輸。

sentences.english: This need for speed has encouraged the development of digital transmission technology.
sentences.chinese: 提高速度的需要促進了數字傳輸技術的發展。

sentences.english: Audio and video devices generally use this transfer type.
sentences.chinese: 音頻和視頻設備一般使用這種傳輸類型。

sentences.english: It does not tie itself to one particular transport.
sentences.chinese: 它並沒有將自己綁定在某種特定傳輸方式上。

sentences.english: Wilson holds a patent on this "Aspherical Propagation Delay" technique.
sentences.chinese: 威爾遜擁有專利的“非球面傳輸時延”技術。

sentences.english: It is related to chunked Transfer-Encoding responses from the server.
sentences.chinese: 它是分塊傳輸編碼的響應從服務器。

sentences.english: Discussion on ultra-long span optical communication engineering construction;
sentences.chinese: 討論了超長站距傳輸系統的各種實現技術。

sentences.english: They are employed by telephone and other telecommunications transmission services establishments.
sentences.chinese: 他們受僱於電話和其他電信傳輸服務場所。

sentences.english: This method controls the sending rate for each source node.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法控制每個信源節點的傳輸速率。

sentences.english: E1 error-free transmission device, called EFTD, is then developed for this purpose.
sentences.chinese: E1上的無差錯傳輸設備就是爲系統可靠性服務的。

sentences.english: It focuses on Ethernet services access, aggregation and transmission in metro area.
sentences.chinese: 它着重於以太網服務的接入，匯聚和城域網傳輸。

sentences.english: In some delivery systems, NF3 may be subjected to adiabatic compression.
sentences.chinese: 在一些傳輸系統裏，NF3可能受到絕熱壓縮。

sentences.english: The easiest way is to use a two-way transport like HTTP.
sentences.chinese: 最簡單的一種就是用類似HTTP的雙向傳輸。

sentences.english: This system can utilize the transmission bandwidth more efficiently and achieve frequency diversity.
sentences.chinese: 這種系統能更有效地利用傳輸帶寬，實現頻率分集。

definition: to store up/to stockpile/(computer) to save/to store/memory/storage
